Text:
Thank you and thank you again for sharing all this, my friend! 

Althrough I have to say there are some very weak covers. #102, for example, is one of the worst. 

That's a shame mainly because this was such an incredible issue originally drawn by the great Barry Windsor Smith (The Uncanny X-Men #205).

It's no surprise this series got cancelled after all. Chris Claremont's backup stories and John Bolton's art were definitely the cherries of this cake, but in the end, without them, the series became redundant and unnecessary.

they certainly were awful near the end of the series. brian stelfreeze did #102-104... he's done some good covers (batman: shadow of the bat, for example) but his work looks very, very rushed on these.

anyway, you're welcome!
